item.title: [PI] Iron Oblivion [PI]
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Acrodox:

oblivion means: death, destruction, the fires from hell…

WHAT

Oblivion means to be forgotten, or oblivious.

Example: “This thread is headed torwards oblivion”

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Iron Oblivion [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:62, topic:362791”][quote author=Acrodox link=topic=459068.msg3382360#msg3382360 date=1288144397]

Of course, Iron Oblivion makes sense.

Iron Destruction? That made perfect sense to me. Anybody else? ;/

Oblivion does not mean destruction. Go get a dictionary…please.

actually it does in some cases
[/quote]

No, there are no ‘cases’ in relevance, where the oblivion means destruction. I have no idea what the fuck you are reading, but you need to pick up a new book. It can sound *or even potentially seem like it would mean destruction, but in logical, literal terms, oblivion, the standard definition, is in no path to meaning what you claim it means.[/quote]

you mad bro?

Read full topic

Iron Destruction? That made perfect sense to me. Anybody else? ;/

[/quote]

actually it does in some cases[/quote]

No, there are no ‘cases’ in relevance, where the oblivion means destruction. I have no idea what the fuck you are reading, but you need to pick up a new book. It can sound *or even potentially seem like it would mean destruction, but in logical, literal terms, oblivion, the standard definition, is in no path to meaning what you claim it means.
